questions.question: Kojo paid ₵270,000.00 for TV Set after he had been given a discount of 10%. FInd the marked price.
What is the total number of pupils who study Government?
How many pupils study only Government?
How many pupils study only Economics?
Which of the following best describes the given construction?
choices: Constructing the bisector of a line segment
Constructing a perpendicular to a line
Constructing a perpendicular to a given line from a point outside the line

preambles.8e62b2b0-9b06-48d2-94a1-641ed031858c: In a secondary school class, 23 pupils study Economics, 6 pupils study both Government and Economics. 48 pupils study either Government or Economics or both.
